application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted to discharge Condition 3 - Condition 3 requires the submission of the following informationa) cross section drawings at a scale of 1:50 and detailed drawings at a scale of 1:20 - 1:5 as necessary to show:(i) materials and build up of horizontal and vertical structures, floors, roof, brickwork, windows, doors,finishes.(ii) Detail drawings and specification of proposed drainage and connection to main sewer(iii) Detail drawings and specification of brickwork bonding, windows, doors, decorative screens to windows,window frames, door frames.b) illustrations and technical specification of new lighting along the existing entrance path and new access gate and intercom, and paving/surface treatment of the pedestrian access way.All the information is required to conclude whether the public realm and both hard and soft landscaping is acceptable in order to preserve or enhance the character or appearance of this part of the Conservation Area.The applicant is advised to resubmit with all the information.
description: Derails required for re-discharge of Conditions 3B (Details of the paving surface in the pedestrian access) and 6 (Hard and soft landscaping scheme and planting plan) of planning permission 18/16588/FUL (Erection of a two storey building comprising three 2 bedroom residential units including associated private gardens and a communal garden. Revised details. Additional information received relating to access road, refuse storage and landscaping)
